meanings.definition: A tool used for shaping or forming metal
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith used a swage to shape the metal bar.
meanings.sent2: The swage is essential for crafting precise metal designs.
meanings.sent3: When the swage went missing, the blacksmith had to improvise with other tools.
meanings.sent4: The swage worked the metal as gently as a sculptor shaping clay.
meanings.sent5: The shiny swage gleamed in the sunlight as it shaped the metal effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To shape or form metal using a swage
meanings.sent1: He will swage the metal into a beautiful ornament.
meanings.sent2: She swages the metal with skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The apprentice accidentally swaged the metal too thin, causing it to bend easily.
meanings.sent4: The hammer swaged the metal like a gentle giant molding clay.
meanings.sent5: With each strike, he swaged the metal closer to the desired shape.

meanings.definition: A shaped piece of metal used for joining or reinforcing materials
meanings.sent1: The swage was hammered into the joint to strengthen it.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the right swage for the metalwork project.
meanings.sent3: The swage rolled off the table and clattered to the floor, startling everyone.
meanings.sent4: The swage acted as a loyal companion, holding the materials together.
meanings.sent5: The old swage bore the marks of many projects, each one a testament to its usefulness.
